data.title: DASSAULT SYST√àMES
data.subtitle: SOLIDWORKS - Software Development Engineer
description: Redesigning the SolidWorks test framework to enhance orchestration speed, integrate agentic AI-driven workflows, and significantly boost overall performance.
Rapidly prototyped AI tools and automation scripts for SolidWorks builds, enhancing developer experience, accelerating build times, and enabling more efficient resource usage.

data.title: DASSAULT SYST√àMES
data.subtitle: SOLIDWORKS - Software Development Intern
description: Rebuilt a legacy crash analytics tracker as a full-stack web application, leveraging caching and advanced data management for enhanced responsiveness, improving performance by 60%.
Introduce automations and optimisation to the feedback system DevOps pipeline for SolidWorks desktop. Assisted in the migration of VMs and build machines from CentOS to RHEL.

data.title: INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY BOMBAY
data.subtitle: e-Yantra - Technical Project Researcher
description: Developed GradeFast, an automated Python-based grading framework that provides immediate feedback and eliminates manual grading.
Maintained a Java Spring-based payment gateway handling 10,000+ transactions during peak hours, automating verification processes to reduce errors by 20%.
Implemented a conversational FAQ chatbot in the e-Yantra Community App using RASA and Django, leading to a 30% reduction in email inquiries and a 20% increase in user engagement.

data.title: INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY BOMBAY
data.subtitle: e-Yantra - Summer Intern
description: Test Driven Development for writing test scripts for the TIVA Launchpad, MSP430 microcontroller.
Developed a cross-platform CLI app for evaluating and grading assignments of students on the client side while maintaining security and confidentiality of the test scripts.

data.title: INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY BOMBAY
data.subtitle: Virtual Labs - Summer Intern
description: Developed frameworks that enhanced the virtual lab experience for physics, chemistry, and biology, facilitating further educational development and research.
Developed the ‚ÄòVlabsDev‚Äô Development Portal to track development, release and reception of all virtual labs developed across India.

Browse my complete portfolio of open-source work, prototypes, and tools on Github.

data.title: TOWARDS DEVELOPING A LEARNING ANALYTICS DASHBOARD FOR A MASSIVE ONLINE ROBOTICS COMPETITION
data.subtitle: IEEE Educon
data.description: This research discusses a dashboard developed for a robotics competition where team characteristics are considered for clustering teams and developing models to predict participants' retention and help the competition's instructors monitor their progress and intervene if necessary.

data.title: SPArK-BOT: AN EDUCATIONAL ROBOTIC PLATFORM
data.subtitle: IEEE Educon
data.description: This paper reports the development and explains the features of a highly versatile educational robot focused on teaching beginner-friendly programming and robotics.

data.title: AUTO-QUERY - A SIMPLE NATURAL LANGUAGE TO SQL QUERY GENERATOR
data.subtitle: IEEE Educon
data.description: The study explored ways to develop an application that takes questions in a natural language and converts them into SQL queries using a sequence-to-sequence model for an e-learning platform.
